settings.heading: Veterinary Hospitals, Boarding Facilities, Pet Hotels

settings.text: Built for high-traffic spaces and hardworking dogs—our durable, easy-clean gear is designed to perform in professional environments where cleanliness, comfort, and efficiency matter most- No more laundry.

• Fused Core™ Utility Mattress: The new standard in veterinary-grade hygiene and performance.
  • 100% Waterproof & Seam-Sealed: Fully sealed seams prevent liquids, bacteria, and allergens from reaching the foam core.
  • Spray & Wipe Clean: Disinfect with commercial pet-safe cleaners—no laundering required.
  • Submersible Construction: Can be fully submerged without fluid penetration.
  • Orthopedic Foam Support: Provides pressure-relieving comfort for post-op, elderly, or recovering pets.
  • Ideal for Clinical Use: Durable waterproof material that can be sprayed with disinfectant and wiped down between patients.

Durable, Orthopedic, Waterproof And Easy to Sanitize.

settings.heading: Durable, Orthopedic, Waterproof And Easy To Sanitize.

settings.title: Working Dogs, Veterinary Hospitals, Boarding Facilities, Pet Hotels
settings.content: Built for high-traffic spaces and hardworking dogs—our durable, easy-clean gear is designed to perform in professional environments where cleanliness, comfort, and efficiency matter most.

settings.title: 100% Waterproof Protection
settings.text: Seam-sealed barrier prevents liquid, bacteria, and allergens from reaching the orthopedic foam.

settings.title: Sanitizes Easily
settings.text: Heavy-duty outer fabric can be cleaned with soap, water, or commercial pet-safe disinfectants—no laundering required.

settings.title: Breathable & Hygienic
settings.text: Unlike traditional waterproof beds, our design allows airflow while keeping moisture out.

settings.title: Built for Heavy Use
settings.text: Durable, fused construction resists breakdown from constant cleaning and daily wear in high-traffic environments.
Eliminate Laundry. Save Time.
Fused Core™ Utility Dog Bed

Our Fused Core™ mattress has become a favorite in veterinary clinics for its unmatched cleanability and durability. Made with a waterproof outer shell, it can be sprayed with disinfectant and wiped down between patients—no need for laundering. The seams are fully sealed, allowing the entire bed to be submerged in liquid without any moisture penetrating the orthopedic foam inside.

In veterinary practices and commercial spaces like pet boarding facilities, towels and woven fabric bedding can easily harbor harmful bacteria, viruses, and parasites. The constant need for laundry creates a huge demand for resources—energy, time, staff, and financial costs. This adds up to more waste, wear on your equipment, and a less efficient environment.

The Solution

Our Fused Core™ Utility Dog Bed is designed to address these issues head-on. It's built to withstand repeated cleaning and sterilization, offering a solution that’s both practical and cost-effective. Simply wipe down with disinfectant, hose off, or even fully submerge to keep it hygienic and fresh between uses.

Made with durable waterproof materials, the Fused Core™ Utility Dog Bed features sealed seams to ensure that liquids can't penetrate into the orthopedic foam inside. Whether you're a veterinary clinic, boarding facility, or pet hotel, our beds provide a cleaner, more sustainable option that reduces laundry costs and helps maintain a healthier environment. They're easy to clean with soap and water or a commercial disinfectant spray, making your routine more efficient and your space more hygienic.

Our Commitment

At Black Lab Brands, we specialize in creating veterinary-grade bedding that offers the comfort pets deserve while promoting a cleaner, healthier space. Our Fused Core™ Utility Dog Bed is engineered for long-lasting durability, ease of cleaning, and cost-saving benefits. Reduce your laundry costs, streamline your processes, and enhance your facility’s hygiene with Black Lab’s Fused Core™ Utility Dog Bed. Perfect for high-traffic spaces where cleanliness and efficiency are paramount.
Shop the Tough Dog Bed
Engineered for working dogs who never slow down—The Beast Dog Bed delivers all-day orthopedic comfort with a fully waterproof, easy-clean design built to handle the toughest conditions.

• The Beast™ Dog Bed: Heavy-duty comfort for working dogs and high-traffic spaces.
  • Waterproof Cover with Reinforced Fabric: Withstands constant use indoors and outdoors.
  • Zippered, Removable Cover: Easy to clean, wipeable, or machine washable when needed.
  • Fused Core™ Mattress Inside: 100% water proof, seam-sealed orthopedic insert for superior protection and hygiene.
  • StayFresh™ Antibacterial Tech: Naturally fights odors, bacteria, and mildew.
  • Fits in Patrol Vehicles: Medium size fits Ford Police Interceptor back seats.

settings.title: Working Dogs
settings.content: Engineered for working dogs who never slow down—The Beast Dog Bed delivers all-day orthopedic comfort with a fully waterproof, easy-clean design built to handle the toughest conditions.

settings.title: StayFresh™ Antibacterial Tech
settings.text: Naturally resists odors, bacteria, and mildew to keep beds cleaner between washes.

settings.title: Easy to Clean, Inside & Out
settings.text: Wipe down the cover or remove it completely—no complicated laundering required.

settings.title: 100% Waterproof Mattress
settings.text: Reinforced, sealed tarpaulin fabric protects against spills, dirt, and daily wear in demanding environments.

settings.title: Fused Core™ Orthopedic Support
settings.text: Seam-sealed orthopedic mattress stays dry, breathable, and fits perfectly in Ford Police Interceptor SUVs (Medium size).
Water Proof. All-Day Comfort.
​​The Beast Dog Bed: The Ultimate Solution for K9 Units and First Responders

In high-intensity environments like those faced by police departments, first responders, and border patrol teams, comfort and durability are key. K9 officers often work long shifts in vehicles, facing tough, unpredictable conditions. 

Standard bedding often lacks the durability and comfort needed for working dogs in these environments. Our Beast Bed is specifically designed with the necessary features to provide lasting comfort and support, making it ideal for the demanding needs of working dogs while standing up to tough conditions.

The Solution

Introducing the Beast Bed with Fused Core™ Technology, designed specifically for demanding work environments. This rugged, waterproof, and highly durable bed offers the perfect combination of orthopedic support and comfort to keep working K9s comfortable during long hours on patrol.

Our Beast Bed is equipped with high-quality, waterproof, and chew-resistant fabric, ensuring it can withstand moisture, dirt, and rough treatment while still maintaining its comfort and support. The medium size is specifically designed to fit perfectly in the back of a Ford Explorer, making it the ideal solution for K9 units and first responders who spend significant time in their vehicles.

Our Commitment

At Black Lab Brands, we’re committed to providing top-quality, durable, and comfortable bedding solutions for working dogs. The Beast Bed with Fused Core™ Technology is engineered to support dogs in high-stress, high-activity roles, like police work, search and rescue, and border patrol. It helps reduce long-term costs, keeps K9s comfortable, and allows officers to focus on the job at hand.
Made Different
From vet clinics to K9 units, our gear is built to perform where durability, hygiene, and comfort matter most—because your work deserves products that work just as hard.
